member.name: IRadialControllerConfigurationInterop.GetForWindow
member.summary: Retrieves a RadialControllerConfiguration object bound to the active application.
member.param: Handle to the window of the active application.
The GUID of the RadialControllerConfiguration object.
Address of a pointer to a RadialControllerConfiguration object.
member.returns: If this function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IRadialControllerConfigurationInterop
member.summary: Enables interoperability with a WinRT RadialControllerConfiguration object and provides access to RadialControllerConfiguration members for customizing a RadialController menu.
